ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] eq at work
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can imagine. I always figured that I d only start doing player lists and tell ing people to find SoW or buffs if I was absolutely desperate -- i.e.,
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Thomas H. Comegys" <comegys@...> wrote:
> I play a level 41 druid on Tarew Marr, and for the
> very reasons you stated,
> I go <anon> or <roleplay> when I am grouped and
> fighting, or otherwise busy.
> At least then people cannot pick me out from some
> far-off place with /who
> all druid 39 44, for example. My appearance is a
> dead giveaway, though. I
> LOOK like a druid.
>
> Don't get me wrong -- I enjoy helping people out.
> Some days I do nothing but
> help out newbies or teleport and SOW people on
> corpse runs, but when I am
> seriously playing, the constant tells and requests
> get downright intrusive.

I can imagine. I always figured that I'd only start
doing player lists and 'tell'ing people to find SoW or
buffs if I was absolutely desperate -- i.e., nasty
corpse run or similar. I figured that if someone was
OFFERING buffs, that's one thing; tracking them down
over half a zone...that's a bit much!

-Hanna


=====
"Bury my lovely, bury the lies, bury me under a thousand goodbyes..." - October Project
